display_long_description:
# Iyo is a spatial puzzle game where you guide floating creatures home. The full release introduces new VR worlds, characters and gameplay.

Your task is simple, but not necessarily easy. Merge matching Iyos and launch them through interdimensional portals that connect back to their distant realm.

Every portal has a limited capacity, so planning is essential. Larger Iyos take up more space, tight environments restrict your movement, and each level becomes a playful challenge in balance and strategy. Think carefully, merge wisely and guide the Iyos home one portal at a time. 

# Merge matching Iyos 
[media]

# Check the Portals capacity
[media]

# Explore new spaces
[media]

If you loved the original mixed-reality, Iyo, it will be added as an update soon 

**Features**
- Replayable levels 
- Colourful environments
- Unique characters
- More updates coming soon!

Restore balance, return the Iyos, and bring order back to this cozy but chaotic game.

# Iyo is a spatial puzzle game where you guide floating creatures home. The full release introduces new VR worlds, characters and gameplay.

Your task is simple, but not necessarily easy. Merge matching Iyos and launch them through interdimensional portals that connect back to their distant realm.

Every portal has a limited capacity, so planning is essential. Larger Iyos take up more space, tight environments restrict your movement, and each level becomes a playful challenge in balance and strategy. Think carefully, merge wisely and guide the Iyos home one portal at a time.
